For a city of porky-goodness, this vegetarian/vegan restaurant has set the bar pretty high.  I had the pumpkin/crispy tempeh salad with some sort of cinnamon dressing.  It really was a darned shame that I ate the whole thing because the desserts looked awesome as well.  The food was absolutely amazing and the service was friendly and quick.  I highly recommend this place for non-meat-eaters and eat meaters alike!
